channel.title: + Help with npc random drops + or to hard for you
channel.description:
How do i get it so when someone kills npc it will drop a random out of this list but when somone kill it it will always drop ( 100k ) and somthing out or the random list Help ? or to hard for you
random list : Dragon legs
Whip
Dragon 2h
bones
Rune scimmy
Dragon scim
and 100 coal
and it picks a random out off them but alwats drop 100k to
thankes if you understand

item.title: + Help with npc random drops + or to hard for you
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

I can do it for you.
But first
You have to tell me which npc it is and what % you want the items to drop at.

Read full topic
